question: As per recent Government data, what percent of Indiaâ€™s prison inmates are illiterate?
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Home Affairs have recently released the data pertaining to the literacy levels of prison inmates in India.
As per the data, 1,32,729 out of 4,78,600 prison inmates in the country are illiterate. This constitutes 27.37 per cent of the total inmates.
